# The `ValueMapTypeRemapper` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a class that can be implemented by clients to remap types when cloning constants and instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ValueMapTypeRemapper</CodeBlock>
